    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public static gnu.io.SerialPort connect(gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier selectedPortIdentifier)
                                 throws gnu.io.PortInUseException,
                                        gnu.io.UnsupportedCommOperationException
        Opens the connection with a SerialPort using the method open in the istance of CommPortIdentifier passed as parameter. Several parameters could be set on the serial connection, at the moment those parameters are hard coded for test purposes.
        Parameters:
        selectedPortIdentifier -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        gnu.io.PortInUseException
        gnu.io.UnsupportedCommOperationException

      • disconnect

        public static void disconnect(gnu.io.SerialPort serialPort)
        Close the connection with a SerialPort, see CommPort.close()
        Parameters:
        serialPort -

      • scanPorts

        public static java.util.List<gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier> scanPorts()
        Scan all the ports using CommPortIdentifier.getPortIdentifiers() and finds those associated with serial ports, putting them into a list.
        Returns:
        a List of CommPortIdentifier, only associated with SerialPorts. If none available prints an error message.

      • selectPort

        @Deprecated
public static gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier selectPort(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,gnu.io.CommPortIdentifier> portMap)
        Deprecated. 
        Usato nell'interfaccia a riga di comando
        Parameters:
        portMap -
        Returns:
